transport.question: I go 'vroom vroom'! I have wheels. What am I?
I float on the water. I can be big or small. What am I?

hints.text: ⚓️ I need an anchor to stop.

transport.question: I fly in the sky. I have wings. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am faster than a car.
✈️ Pilots fly me to far away places.
🌎 I can take you to another country.

transport.question: I go 'choo choo'! I ride on tracks. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I follow a special road made of metal.

transport.question: I help you go up and down. I'm in tall buildings. What am I?

hints.text: 🚪 I have doors that open and close.
🏢 You find me in places with many floors.

transport.question: I have two wheels and pedals. You use your feet to move me. What am I?

hints.text: 🚴 You can ride me in the park.
🔔 I have a bell to ring.
👧 You can learn to ride me with training wheels.

transport.question: I am big and yellow. I take kids to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I have a stop sign that comes out.
🎒 I pick up children in the morning.
🏫 I drop children off after school.

transport.question: I am red and loud. I help people when there is a fire. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I have a siren that goes 'wee woo'.
🚒 I have a long hose that sprays water.

transport.question: I am big and long. I carry lots of things in boxes. What am I?

hints.text: 🚚 I am bigger than a car.
🛣️ I drive long distances on highways.

transport.question: I fly to the moon. I am very fast. What am I?

hints.text: ⭐ I travel very far away to visit other planets.

food.question: I am yellow, and monkeys like to peel me. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am the color of sunshine.

food.question: I am round and red, sometimes green. You can bite me or juice me. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 My color is often the same as a firetruck.

food.question: I am orange and crunchy. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🔶 My color is the same as a pumpkin.

food.question: I am small and green. I grow in a pod. You can eat me as a snack. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 My color is the same as grass.

food.question: I am white and you drink me. Cows give me. What am I?
I am long and brown. You can mash me or fry me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 You can make french fries out of me.

food.question: I am orange and juicy. I grow on a tree and have a peel. What am I?

hints.text: 🍊 My name is the same as my color.

food.question: I am a yellow circle, often on pizza. Mice like to eat me too. What am I?
I am long and green. I am a yummy pickle! What am I?

hints.text: 🥗 You can find me in salads.

food.question: I am made from flour, water, and yeast, and you bake me in the oven. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 People eat me at breakfast, lunch, and dinner.
🥪 You can put fillings in me.
